prompt:
Nurse: I'm sorry, Mr. Delarosa, I didn't quite catch that. Could you please repeat what you said?

Patient: I said I hate following this diet and

Nurse: Hold on a second while I figure out how I can best support you.

Patient: trying to monitor my fluid restriction.

Nurse: When did the change in speech start, Mr. Delarosa?

Patient: No change in speech. What are you talking about? I don't have any change in speech.

Nurse: I apologize for any confusion, Mr. Delarosa. I was asking if you've noticed any sudden arm or leg weakness recently?

Patient: Why? No.

responses.gpt4: Thank you for clarifying, Mr. Delarosa. I'm asking to ensure we're not missing any potential symptoms related to your health condition. Have you experienced any sudden confusion or trouble understanding others?
responses.our_model: Thank you for your response, Mr. Delarosa. Now, do you report any numbness on your arms or legs?
